name: World of Warships: Legends - Going on Two!
name_original: World of Warships: Legends - Going on Two!
description:
Set sail with some free goodies and equipment as thanks for a great second year of World of Warships: Legends!

This bundle includes: - 2 days of Premium Account - 10x Type 1 Camouflages - 10x Type 2 Camouflages - 10x Type 3 Camouflages - 10x Hunter Camouflages - 37,000 Commander XP

Content such as Boosters, Commander XP, Camouflages, etc., only becomes visible after reaching a specific account level in the game.
